title: League will not open, For the second time
body: My, lol.launcher.admin will not open, i mean it does and comes up with the old client opening, when i click play something loads and its an error message (.ddl) anyone please help?

replies.body:
If this is one of those strange dll errors, we should be able to fix that up pretty easily and quickly! Follow the steps in the image I'm linking below, but feel free to hit me back up if that doesn't help.

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
